This is a **follow up form**. It will collect additional or updated information about a previously registered case. You can then save this information to the case as **case properties**, reference previously collected data, or update properties (ex. child's weight).
* To setup how the list of cases will look on the phone, choose the Follow Up module, and then select which case properties you want to display in the list and detail screens ([Help Site Info on Case List and Detail Screens](https://confluence.dimagi.com/display/commcarepublic/Case+List+and+Case+Detail+Configuration)) * You can add text, number, multiple choice or other question types to this form. * For multiple choice questions, use the circle button in the toolbar to add more choices. * On the main form page, you can choose which of these questions you want to *save to the case* as case properties.
For more help, see the following Help Site Pages:
* [CommCare Forms](https://confluence.dimagi.com/display/commcarepublic/Form+Builder) * [Case Management Overview](https://confluence.dimagi.com/display/commcarepublic/Case+Management). * [Application Building Tutorials](https://confluence.dimagi.com/display/commcarepublic/Application+Building+Tutorial+Series)
When you're ready to test your application, you can use the Try In CloudCare option on the form settings page, or [install it on a phone using our deploy manager](https://confluence.dimagi.com/display/commcarepublic/Deploy+an+Application+on+CommCareHQ).
